statements: DELETE FROM rent_payment_reminders WHERE tenant_id = 123 AND payment_due_date = '2022-03-15';
DELETE FROM rent_payment_reminders WHERE property_id = 456 AND last_payment_date < '2022-03-01';
DELETE FROM rent_payment_reminders WHERE reminder_date < '2022-02-01' AND property_id = 1;
DELETE FROM rental_properties WHERE address = '123 Main Street' AND rent_due_date < '2022-03-15';
DELETE FROM payment_notifications WHERE tenant_id = 200 AND property_id = 300;
DELETE FROM payment_reminders WHERE reminder_sent = true;
DELETE FROM Landlords WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com' AND name LIKE '%Doe%';
